verses.verse: And <WG2532> On The <WG3588> Day <WG2250> <WG3588> Third <WG5154> A Marriage <WG1062> Took Place <WG1096> In <WG1722> Cana <WG2580> <WG3588> Of Galilee, <WG1056> And <WG2532> Was <WG2258> The <WG3588> Mother <WG3384> <WG3588> Of Jesus <WG2424> There. <WG1563>

And <WG2532> He Says <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> Draw Out <WG501> Now <WG3568> And <WG2532> Carry <WG5342> To The <WG3588> Master Of The Feast. <WG755> And <WG2532> They Carried It. <WG5342>

<WG5613> But When <WG1161> Had Tasted <WG1089> The <WG3588> Master Of The Feast <WG755> The <WG3588> Water <WG5204> Wine <WG3631> That Had Become, <WG1096> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Knew Not <WG1492> Whence <WG4159> It Is, <WG2076> <WG3588> but The <WG1161> Servants <WG1249> Knew <WG1492> Who <WG3588> Had Drawn <WG501> The <WG3588> Water, <WG5204> Calls <WG5455> The <WG3588> Bridegroom <WG3566> The <WG3588> Master Of The Feast <WG755>

And <WG2532> Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Every <WG3956> Man <WG444> First <WG4412> The <WG3588> Good <WG2570> Wine <WG3631> Sets On, <WG5087> And <WG2532> When <WG3752> They May Have Drunk Freely <WG3184> Then <WG5119> The <WG3588> Inferior; <WG1640> Thou <WG4771> Hast Kept <WG5083> The <WG3588> Good <WG2570> Wine <WG3631> Until <WG2193> Now. <WG737>

And <WG2532> He Found <WG2147> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Temple <WG2411> Those Who <WG3588> Sold <WG4453> Oxen <WG1016> And <WG2532> Sheep <WG4263> And <WG2532> Doves, <WG4058> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Money Changers <WG2773> Sitting; <WG2521>

And <WG2532> To Those Who <WG3588> The <WG3588> Doves <WG4058> Sold <WG4453> He Said, <WG2036> Take <WG142> These Things <WG5023> <WG1782> Hence; <WG3361> Make Not <WG4160> The <WG3588> House <WG3624> <WG3588> <WG3962> Of My Father <WG3450> A House <WG3624> Of Merchandise. <WG1712>

<WG3415> And Remembered <WG1161> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples <WG846> That <WG3754> Written <WG1125> It Is, <WG2076> The <WG3588> Zeal <WG2205> <WG3588> <WG3624> Of Thine House <WG4675> Has Eaten Up <WG2719> Me. <WG3165>

Answered <WG611> Therefore <WG3767> The <WG3588> Jews <WG2453> And <WG2532> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> What <WG5101> Sign <WG4592> Shewest Thou <WG1166> To Us <WG2254> That <WG3754> These Things <WG5023> Thou Doest? <WG4160>

<WG846> But Himself <WG1161> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3756> Did Not Trust <WG4100> Himself <WG1438> To Them, <WG846> <WG1223> <WG3588> Because Of <WG846> His Knowing <WG1097> All Men, <WG3956>
